Description: Up for sale is this vintage 1978 Aria Pro II PE-450 electric guitar. This guitar is in great condition for it's age, showing only minor wear and a few scuffs and dings. The guitar features a very beautiful Tobacco Brown Sunburst finish. This guitar appears to be all original (maybe only pickups were changed) and plays and sounds great! Here’s a little bit of history: So I still keep this guitar more than anything by collection and not by playing it, since I do not know how to play guitar. This guitar belonged to my father who rests in peace, Héctor Martínez "El Borrado", first master of the film "EL TOPO" by Alejandro Jodorowsky, was the favorite film of John Lennon who later sponsored "La Montaña Sagrada" at the end of the 60's. My father was in the backstage of The Doors, the only time they went to Mexico City in the early 70's, when Jim Morrison had a long beard, and there is the anecdote that they lived together in that concert in "El Fórum". My father was a musician, he played the guitar, he had rock bands like: The Sleepers, The Diplomats, he played with Javier Bátiz, and more. I never learned to play guitar as I said before, just piano and percussion. The PE-450 was made of Maple body (later Mahogany) and birch bolt neck. This vintage Aria Pro plays like butter and looks absolutely stunning. This item is sold As-Described and cannot be returned unless it arrives in a condition different from how it was described or photographed. Beautiful Aria Pro II PE-450 1978 Japan Vintage Prototype Electric Guitar! 70’s Aria Pro II PE-450 Electric Guitar Made In JAPAN Great Condition & Plays Excellent! PLEASE DO NOT mistake picture glare for flaws.. If you think your seeing something not mentioned in this listing, please ask! This PE-450 is in Very Good Condition Over All for being 40 years old! Everything is pictured, so there will be no surprises with this sale.. Buy with confidence! 100% Positive always! Please review ALL PICS below for the true cosmetic condition before and after reading this description. All has been tested and operates without issues!! This great playing PE-450 has no issues other than some minor cosmetic flaws as you would expect of a taken care of, used, played, loved, almost vintage guitar. As you can see its still in really, really clean condition, but does have some minor scratches,dings, etc. The finish is definitely the original finish and is still nice, clean and shiny. The frets show extremely minor wear, and finger board is in great shape. The back of the neck and headstock are in great shape also. There really isn't any buckle rash to speak of. Everything appears to be correct and the serial number is listed for your review. Its truly a great player for the money! This guitar is freshly strung and plays great! Although, I think its set up great, everyone has their own preferences. If your not happy with its set up, it will be your responsibility and cost to have it set up to your liking.. The neck is straight and the truss rod operates as it should. Included Soft Case, I’am including this case for shipping purposes only. You will want to find another case for it. Everything operates as it should, and has never had, nor does it have any breaks, or repairs unless noted above. Make sure you view all of the pics, and ask questions if you have any concerns before buying. FREE SHIPPING ON UPS! 🚛 Thanks!!! Yours Rene G. 🤙🏾 🤟🏾
Title: 1978 Aria Pro II PE-450 Vintage Made in Japan 70’s Electric Guitar Used Tested!
